ValidationRule.description: Users can still create Opps from "New" button, and on that layout Opps can be cerated without having Accounts. This VR is to prevent it from happening.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities should not be created from "New" button. Please create either through 1) Lead Conversion, 2) "New Business" button on Contact, 3) "New Upsell" button on an Account.
